channel.title: [525] how do you make weapon mod plus stuff like that
channel.description:
alright.. I found where the weapons were... and I'm tryin to figure out how to make some of them mod+.. does anyone know how to do that ? or is it in like a cmd or somthin..
also, if anyone knows how to make commands and stuff mod+. also, if anyone knows where therre is like a dl for making 525 commands.. or tut or somthin.. tyvm

item.title: [525] how do you make weapon mod plus stuff like that
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

if(playerRights < 1 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) { setEquipment(bla, -1); }

Something like that, then just throw it in process()

Read full topic
item.source: [525] how do you make weapon mod plus stuff like that
